function.name: es_regexfilter
function.description: Matches the value of field against regex. This returns a string identifier that can be used to identify this filter. If the document does not have field it will not be included in the search query.For more information on the regex syntax see: http://www.elastic.co/guide/en/elasticsearch/reference/current/query-dsl-regexp-query.html#regexp-syntax

example.description: Find the documents which have the words “color”, “colour”, “colored” or “coloured” in the field “text”:
